mapper.insert: insert into icemanagement.space_reserve_records (user_id, space_id, reserve_time, duration, update_time,create_time, status,remark) VALUES (#{userId},#{spaceId},#{reserveTime},#{duration},#{updateTime},#{createTime},#{status},#{remark})

insert into icemanagement.equipment_rental_records (user_id, equipment_id, rental_time, return_time, update_time, status, remark, create_time) VALUES (#{userId},#{equipmentId},#{rentalTime},#{returnTime},#{updateTime},#{status},#{remark},#{createTime})
mapper.select: select s.space_name, u.user_name, u.sex, u.phone, u.id_number, rr.reserve_time, rr.duration, rr.create_time, rr.remark from icemanagement.space_reserve_records rr left join icemanagement.user u on rr.user_id = u.id left join icemanagement.space s on rr.space_id = s.id where u.id = #{id} order by create_time DESC

select e.equipment_name, u.user_name, u.sex, u.phone, u.id_number, err.rental_time, err.return_time, err.remark, err.create_time from icemanagement.equipment_rental_records err left join icemanagement.user u on err.user_id = u.id left join icemanagement.equipment e on err.equipment_id = e.id where u.id = #{userId}
